in each st around f/o and leave a long tail for sewing sweet oddity art 6 mane make 2 with color d and d hook chain 26 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook and across do not f/o working off that chain chain 26 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook and across do not f/o chain 36 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook and across do not f/o work 2 more chains of 36 work 4 chains of 46 work 2 chains of 56 f/o and leave a long tail for sewing tail with color d chain 26 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook and across do not f/o working off that chain chain 26 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook and across do
